alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Howard (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 7:23AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hempstead and southeastern Howard Counties through 745 AM CDT... At 722 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nashville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nashville, Mineral Springs, Tollette, Corinth, Saratoga, McCaskill, Ozan and Bright Star. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
